EmailTemplate.textOnly: - - - - 90 Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE Hi Russell, I think it would be great to share the advice. Just make sure it is done over phone so it doesn’t come off the wrong way. Emails can be terrible for that. Thanks!Sara ___________________________________SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: From: <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com">sconde@mbopartners.comw: www.mbopartners.com Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com and permanently delete the e-mail and files. <span style='font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Tahoma","sans-serif";mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman"> russell.klein.101@gmail.com [mailto:russell.klein.101@gmail.com] On Behalf Of Russell Klein Sent: Wednesday, February 15, 2012 5:30 PM To: Sara Conde Subject: Fwd: Tower Companies Recycling Presentations - Dates Sara, I have advice for Eugenia on her vetting of a new hauler... to share, or not to share....??? Russ---------- Forwarded message ---------- From: Eugenia Gregorio < <mailto:eugenia.gregorio@towercompanies.com">eugenia.gregorio@towercompanies.com<span style='mso-bookmark:_MailOriginal>> Date: Wed, Feb 15, 2012 at 4:45 PM Subject: RE: Tower Companies Recycling Presentations - Dates To: Russell Klein < <mailto:klein@russellkleinassociates.com">klein@russellkleinassociates.com>Russell – I wanted to let you know that we are in the process of re-evaluating our waste hauler and finding a new one for all D.C. buildings. This change will take place before your presentation. I can give you more details after the contract with the new vendor is finalized but it will be a good change, I know that! Thanks! Eugenia Gregorio, LEED AP BD+CSUSTAINABILITY MANAGER2000 Tower Oaks Blvd., Ninth Floor Rockville, Maryland 20852Main: 301.984.7000 Direct: 301.692.1463 Fax: 301.692.1558 Mobile: 301.922.3071eugenia.gregorio@towercompanies.com www.towercompanies.comP Please consider the environment before printing this e-mail.
